content: is desired length tie off do steps 1-8 on other side of base for other strap weave in ends raised base 1 using the charcoal heather chain 16 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 15sts turn 3 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 17sts turn 4 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 19sts turn 5 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 21sts turn 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 21sts turn 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 21sts turn 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 21sts turn 9 chain 2 9 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 9 half_double_crochet turn 10 2hdctog 6 half_double_crochet 5 slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet 2hdctog 19sts turn 11 2hdctog 3 half_double_crochet single_crochet 7 slip_stitch single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 2hdctog 17sts 12 chain 1 edge the raised base the same way you edged the flat base at the beginning of the pattern but do not tie off after you slip_stitch to the chain 1 st at this point the pattern continues in rounds 13 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around in the back loop only join with a sl st to chain 1 14 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around in both loops when you reach the nose area single_crochet the middle three stitches of the nose shaping together 3sctog this helps with maintaining the proper shape when you stuff the raised base later continue single_crochet all the way around to chain 1 st join with a slip_stitch to chain 1 15 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around when you reach the nose area single_crochet the middle three stitches of the noise shaping together 3sctog continue single_crochet all the way around to chain 1 st join with a slip_stitch to chain 1 16 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around join with a slip_stitch to chain 1 17 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around join with a slip_stitch to chain 1 fasten_off smaller flat base attached to flat part of raised base 1 using the black yarn chain 12 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 11sts turn 3 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 13sts turn 4 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 15sts turn 5 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet all the way across to last stitch 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 17sts turn 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 17sts turn 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 17sts turn 8 chain 2 7 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 7 half_double_crochet 17sts turn
